name: Battle For Calitram's Gold
description:
This game was made for Miz Jam 1 and is my first ever entry to a game jam! This is a strategy game in which you play as the invaders and have to deploy your armies against an array of defensive turrets.  I was inspired by game's such as Warlords and Plants vs Zombies.  

I hope to release the source code for this game on git hub once it's been made a bit more readable, and possibly also a devlog.

Thanks for giving it a try, and I hope you enjoy playing it!
